Articles.Content:
Hi guys. This is really off topic.

I'm sure some of you guys (if not, many) have seen the scale of the universe thing right?

If not, it's here!

But have you seen the guys who made that, also made a youtube series called "Battle for Dream Island". That explains my Profile Picture.

This show is awesome. Especially for those who like thrills. There are spacey stuff too!

This show started in 2010 Jan and currently in its second season (also known as Battle for Dream Island Again).

The show

The channel

The show maybe juvenile in the first few episodes though

P.S.
